document.full_text: a suicide bomber killed at least seven people and wounded 10 more, mostly iraqi policemen, as they were investigating a car bombing north of baghdad, an iraqi interior ministry source said on sunday.
document.title: suicide bomber kills at least 7 in iraq
lines_and_colors: a suicide bomber killed at least seven people and wounded 10 more, mostly iraqi policemen, as they were investigating a car bombing north of baghdad, an iraqi interior ministry source said on sunday.
